name: Abu Snah in Neom
description:
YOU CAN USE XBOX Controller TO PLAY

INFORMATION: 

Platforming game about an industrial underground shipping facility taken over by the crazed anarchist rats.

DONATION: This game is 100% Free and developing games is expensive. So any amount of donation will really help us to improve and to fund our upcoming games. Thank you!

Credits: 

Directed by Bassam Almutairi

Programmed by Ibrahim Alrshood, Bassam Almutairi

Character art by Mohammed Qasem

Environment Art Kholoud Maarof, Omar abahusain, Mohammed Qasem

UI by Samaa Kinsar, Lamia Alsulami
